studio.title: Voxel Studio
studio.description: A tool to modify DATAPACKS content with the simplest and most intuitive interface that requires no development knowledge.

upload.description: Drop your datapack or mod (.zip or .jar) here to start configuring

values.question: What is this tool for?
values.answer: This tool is designed to modify enchantments of existing content, such as NeoEnchant+, Dungeons & Taverns, or any other pack, with the simplest and most intuitive interface that requires no development knowledge.

values.question: Minecraft Java Edition or Bedrock Edition?
values.answer: This tool is designed for Minecraft Java Edition. Bedrock Edition is not supported.

values.question: How do I get started?
values.answer: Simply drop existing content into the gray area. You can also modify Minecraft's base content using the white button.

values.question: Mods or Datapacks?
values.answer: This tool is designed to support both datapacks and mods (Forge, Fabric, NeoForge, Quilt).

values.question: How do I download the modified content?
values.answer: When you are in the configuration interface, in the bottom left, you will find a white download button.

values.question: If the content gets updated, will I have to redo everything?
values.answer: If you want to update your configuration to a different version of the original work, there is a migration tool available.

seo.title: Datapack/Mods Converter · Voxel
seo.description: Convert your datapacks to Forge, Fabric, Quilt, and NeoForge mods easily with our online tool.

converter.description: This tool allows you to easily convert your Minecraft datapacks into mods for different platforms: Forge, Fabric, Quilt, and NeoForge. Simply drop your ZIP file and choose the target platforms.
converter.instruction: Drop your datapack ZIP file here.
converter.dropzone: Drop your datapack in the ZIP format here

description_list.1: Drop your datapack ZIP file here.
description_list.2: The .jar file will be automatically downloaded in your browser, you can use it in your Minecraft game on any platform. (Forge, Fabric, Quilt, NeoForge)

step1.title: Drop your datapack ZIP file
step1.description: Drop your datapack ZIP file here, it will be analyzed and converted automatically.

step2.title: The download starts automatically
step2.description: The .jar file will be automatically downloaded and usable on all platforms. (Forge, Fabric, Quilt, NeoForge)

form.name: Name
form.advanced_description: This information will be displayed in the mod listing on Modrinth/CurseForge and in the mod menu of Minecraft.
form.authors_placeholder: Type and press Enter to add

seo.title: Datapack Migration · Voxel
seo.description: Migrate your mods or datapacks, modified by the configurator, to a different version, while keeping your modifications active.

migration.home_description: Migrate your mods or datapacks, modified by the configurator, to a different version, while keeping your modifications active.
migration.source: Your datapack customized by the configurator
migration.target: The datapack you want to update

drop.source: Drop your datapack customized by the configurator in this box
drop.target: Drop the datapack you want to update in this box

error_types.invalid_datapack: This content is not a datapack modified by the configurator
error_types.no_logs: No migration file found in the content

success_info.additional_info: Quick tip: You can rename any mod or datapack - it won't affect anything!

about.text: This tool lets you migrate from a datapack/mod you've customized with the configurator to another version of the same project, keeping your modifications active on the latest version.

list.first: You can migrate to any version, whether it's new or old.
list.second: You can migrate from a datapack to mods, or vice versa.
list.third: It works with any mods or datapack.

about.title: Explore our datapacks
about.description: On Modrinth, find all our datapacks, like NeoEnchant which adds enchantments, Yggdrasil which adds a nordic story with tons of structures!

step1.title: Drop your datapack modified by the configurator
step1.description: Drop the datapack you modified with the configurator here, it'll be automatically analyzed and migrated.

step2.title: Drop the datapack you want to update
step2.description: Drop the datapack you want to migrate to here, and the configuration will be automatically applied from the pack you dropped on the left.

step3.title: Migration complete
step3.description: Once the migration is complete, the datapack will automatically download in your browser

footer.description: VOXEL, what is it? These are guides in French, from beginner to advanced level, to learn how to develop mods or enrich your existing knowledge.
